pullrequest.title: Refactor example building test, fix standalone examples (#1555)

content.raw:
right, I have a pure CMake build installed to a local folder, I have run `make install` for Gazebo, and my environment variables look like:

```
PATH=/home/jackie/local/bin:...
LD_LIBRARY_PATH =/home/jackie/local/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu::/home/jackie/local/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/gazebo-6.0/plugins
PKG_CONFIG_PATH=PKG_CONFIG_PATH=/home/jackie/local/lib/pkgconfig:/home/jackie/local/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/pkgconfig
CMAKE_PREFIX_PATH =/home/jackie/local/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/cmake
```

any idea what I should set so this test will pass?
